tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE pricing_strategies (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    competitor_name VARCHAR(255),
    product_name VARCHAR(255),
    price DECIMAL(10, 2),
    sale_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE competitor_data (
  competitor_id INT,
  competitor_name VARCHAR,
  product_id INT,
  price DECIMAL,
  date_updated TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE sales_records (
  sale_id INT,
  product_id INT,
  sale_date DATE,
  units_sold INT,
  revenue DECIMAL
);

CREATE TABLE sales_records (
    sales_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_id INT,
    product_id INT,
    sale_date DATE,
    sale_amount DECIMAL
);

CREATE TABLE competitor_data (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    competitor_name VARCHAR(255),
    product_name VARCHAR(255),
    price DECIMAL(10, 2),
    timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE historical_sales_records (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    product_id INT,
    sale_date DATE,
    quantity INT,
    total_sales DECIMAL(10, 2)
);

CREATE TABLE sales_history (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    product_id INT,
    sale_date DATE,
    quantity INT,
    total_sales DECIMAL(10, 2)
);

CREATE TABLE competitor_analysis (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    competitor_name VARCHAR(255),
    analysis_date DATE,
    strength TEXT,
    weakness TEXT
);
